Generation IV.Diamond: It flies around forests and fields in search of bug Pokémon. It stays within a huge flock.
Generation IV.Pearl: It lives in forests and fields. Squabbles over territory occur when flocks collide.
Generation IV.Platinum: Recognizing their own weakness, they always live in a group. When alone, a Staravia cries noisily.
Generation IV.HeartGold: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
Generation IV.SoulSilver: They maintain huge flocks, although fierce scuffles break out between various flocks.
